childMarkdownRemark.rawMarkdownBody:
Hi I'm Vardan

I'm a Computer Science '16 undergrad from National Institute of Technology, Allahabad with a CGPA of 8.3 on a scale of 10.

I have extensive experience both into back-end systems(mostly into Java) and front-end frameworks(AngularJS and ReactJS) which allows me to visualise the problem completely end-to-end, right from an efficient system design of it to how it would look like to the end user.

I follow a very methodical approach of software development. I believe in delivering solutions in a timely, extensible, maintainable, readable and most importantly reliable manner, for which I have extensive experience working in testing frameworks like Cypress, Jest and JUnit.

I prefer working on projects that make a direct impact to the end user. Solving real-world problems that people face today in IT industry intrigues me the most.
